channel.title: OTHERS CANNOT LOGIN w/ client
channel.description: Well nobody but me can connect to my client and Idont kno why Looking for help ,, I tired about everything but I may be looking into on how to MAKE A CLIENT, that will allow you to change the sever ip and port, Does anybody kno how to do this or can help me please.

item.title: OTHERS CANNOT LOGIN w/ client
item.dc:creator: @bsf316 bsf316
item.description:
@bsf316 wrote:

WORKED TY //CLOSED <3

[quote=“Spades, post:5, topic:325956”]Gui.server = JOptionPane.showInputDialog(null, "ninjapkz.zapto.org: ", “ninjapkz.zapto.org”, 1);

(null, "ninjapkz.zapto.org: ",

There should be no “:” after your ip, so make it this

Gui.server = JOptionPane.showInputDialog(null, “ninjapkz.zapto.org”, “ninjapkz.zapto.org”, 1);

Then try[/quote]

item.title: OTHERS CANNOT LOGIN w/ client
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

If you explain your question better, we may provide better and more supportive help. Currently I’m thinking you need to portforward but there is also the possibility of you talking about the client IP being wrong so they are connecting to 127.0.0.1 or some other IP.

Read full topic

item.title: OTHERS CANNOT LOGIN w/ client
item.dc:creator: @bsf316 bsf316
item.description:
@bsf316 wrote:

could it be this if so post the fixed code plz ( have a few possible reasons)THE PUBLIC IP IS ninjapkz.zapto.org

public URL getCodeBase() { if(signlink.mainapp != null) return signlink.mainapp.getCodeBase(); try { if(super.aFrame_Sub1_15 != null) return new URL("http://+Gui.ninjapkz.zapto.org+" + (43594 + anInt958));
also

Gui.server = JOptionPane.showInputDialog(null, "ninjapkz.zapto.org: ", "ninjapkz.zapto.org", 1);

(THOSE WERE in client.java)
ANOTHER REASON COULD BE gui.java (as listed below)

System.out.println("Attempting to Connect"); Serverip = "ninjapkz.zapto.org"; sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(Serverip));

and one more suspicious code is this

public static String detail = null; int world = 1; public static String loop = null; public static String settalk = null; public static String setchateffects = null; public static String setname = null; public static String setchat = null; public JFrame frame; public String Serverip; public static double version = 6.2;
